articles.title: A look at the first artificial solar eclipses created by two European satellites
articles.description: A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses through precise and fancy formation flying

articles.title: Aspergillus fumigatus, lethal fungus spreading across US raises alarm - Florida, Texas, California & more states at risk
articles.description: A deadly airborne fungus, Aspergillus fumigatus, is spreading rapidly in the US, threatening people with weakened immune systems. It causes aspergillosis, a fatal lung infection, with rising heat, drug resistance, and poor tracking worsening the crisis.
articles.content: A deadly fungus that can rot human tissue from within is rapidly spreading across the United States, with experts sounding alarm over rising temperatures, widespread drug resistance, and the lack of national disease tracking. According to a report in... [3372 chars]

articles.title: Group urges Marcos to veto Konektadong Pinoy bill
articles.description: A group of telecommunications companies on Monday urged President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. to veto the Konektadong Pinoy Bill, citing national security issues.
articles.content:

articles.title: Women's Super League to expand to 14 teams from 2026/27 season with relegation play-off also in plans
articles.description: WSL will expand to 14 teams from the 2026/27 season; Next season, the WSL 2s top two teams will be promoted, with third-place facing a relegation play-off with the top-flights bottom team; from then, 14th-placed will face WSL relegation, then 13th faces WSL 2 runners-up in a play-off
articles.content:
The Women's Super League is set to expand to 14 teams from the 2026/27 season.
The current league format sees one team relegated from the women's football's top tier, but it will now change to two teams relegated and promoted every season.
In order t... [4150 chars]

articles.title: Astronomers locate universe's 'missing' matter
articles.description: WASHINGTON - The universe has two kinds of matter. There is invisible dark matter, known only because of its gravitational effects on a grand scale. And there is ordinary matter such as gas, dust, stars, planets and earthly things like cookie dough and canoes. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: An artist's conception depicts warm, thin gas in a vast region between galaxies - called the intergalactic medium, in this handout illustration image obtained by REUTERS. Blue highlights denser regions of the cosmic web, transitioning to redder light... [5002 chars]

articles.title: Juror Dismissed In Sean "Diddy" Combs Trial For Perceived "Lying"
articles.description: A juror in Sean "Diddy" Comb's sex-trafficking trial has been shown the door after perpetuating a number of different versions of where he lives.
articles.content: Jurors in Sean “Diddy” Combs’ sex-trafficking trial are hearing a plethora of seemingly incriminating texts on abuse, “freak-offs,” drugs and the defendant’s “Kryptonite” from the Bad Boy Records founder’s ex-top aide Kristina Khorram. However, it is... [4842 chars]

articles.title: Harvard prof turns to private equity to counter Trump research cuts

articles.title: Black coffee tied to lower death risk
articles.description: A new study links coffee consumption to lower risk of all-cause mortality, but found benefits diminished with additives like milk or sugar.
